Prev: Mark Up: Joshua Tree Next: Backlit cholla, I

Smokestack cloud



Sara told me the clouds looked like a giant ship, and this was the plume of smoke rising from the ship's smokestack.
Taken Sunday, October 13, 2002, 07:09:07am.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 5.6Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1250s @ F4.0, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 70mm (112mm equiv)
PS6 Levels 50:1:255, USM 10:50 - 100:0.5
